Title: Outer Pier
Description: Tarred ropes sing in the wind. Lanterns draw wet halos over timber and salt.
Paragraphs: A bored quartermaster jerks his chin toward a barrel: "Tutorial kits. Take what you need. Then get out of the way."
Salt, tar, and wet timber mix on the air; gulls quarrel above the swell while merchants count coin with red fingers.

Options.Label: Collect dockside supplies (2x minor potion, 2x bread)
Options.Text: Collect dockside supplies (2x minor potion, 2x bread)

Options.Label: Speak to the Dockmaster about papers
Options.Text: Speak to the Dockmaster about papers

Exits.Text: Down to the slick catwalk under the pier
